Flavor Graveyard
================

Even the best Ben & Jerry’s flavors eventually melt away. Here we lay our dearly de-pinted to rest so we can mourn their chunks and swirls and keep their sweet memories alive.

Flavor Graveyard | Ben & Jerry’s – Video
----------------------------------------

* Aloha Macadamia
  ---------------

  **2001-2002**

  Rich milk chocolate cashew Brazil-nut butter ice cream with macadamia nuts covered in white & dark fudge & milk chocolatey swirl.

  *We won't blame the macadamia

  But we were kinda in denial

  The Marketplace had spoken:

  Mac got aloha'ed off the aisle.*

  ![Aloha Macadamia tombstone](/files/live/sites/systemsite/files/US%20and%20Global%20Assets/Flavors/Graveyard/tombstones_2023_0039_graveyard_aloha_macadamia.jpg)
* Bovinity Divinity
  -----------------

  **1998-2001**

  Milk chocolate ice cream & white fudge cows swirled with white chocolate ice cream & dark fudge cows

  *Where do all the cows go

  when heaven gives the word?

  This flavor kicked the bucket

  when angels took the herd.*

  ![Bovinity Divinity tombstone](/files/live/sites/systemsite/files/US%20and%20Global%20Assets/Flavors/Graveyard/tombstones_2023_0031_graveyard_bovinity_divinity.jpg)
* Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Frozen Yogurt
  -----------------------------------------

  **1994-2001**

  Vanilla frozen yogurt with gobs of chocolate chip cookie dough

  *So now we know:
